summary: In 1870, after a brutal run-in with an outlaw in a brothel, Mike Blueberry becomes marshal in Arizona where he keeps the peace between Whites and Apaches but an influx of Indian gold treasure-hunters threatens to lead to violence.
cast: Vincent Cassel|Juliette Lewis|Michael Madsen|Temuera Morrison|Ernest Borgnine|Djimon Hounsou|Hugh O'Conor|Geoffrey Lewis|Nichole Hiltz|Kateri Walker|Vahina Giocante|Guillermo Arévalo|Tchéky Karyo|Eddie Izzard|Colm Meaney|Dominique Bettenfeld|Antonio Monroi|William Lightning|Jan Kounen|François Levantal|Joel Gonzales|Panshin Biri|Juan Manuel Bernal|François Bercovici|Richard Andrew Jones|Val Avery|Pascal Demolon|Leticia Gutiérrez|Tetsuo Nagata|Cyril Dupuy|Paul Rodden|Javier Clave|José Gómez Parcero|Karl Braun|Jean 'Moebius' Giraud|Chattoune
keywords: underwater sex|based on graphic novel|female nudity|female frontal nudity|character name as title
title: Blueberry: La experiencia secreta
